name: Springwithdojo
tagline: This is a open source project that demos how to use Spring with Dojo
body:
This is a sample project I made to show how to use Maven, Spring, Webflow and Dojo. You will find a number of examples that can help  you

## Examples in this project:
    Say Hello (Spring MVC)

	Customer Registration with Spring Security Login
	CheckBox with Dojo
	Dropdown with Dojo
	Dropdown(workaround fix) with Dojo
	Radio Button with Dojo
	Field Size with Dojo
	Social Secuirty Field with Dojo 
	Form Button with Dojo 
	TextArea with Dojo 
	Pane Play with Dojo 

Please feel free to update this project if you would like

## Getting The Project and Running It

To get this project and run it you will need to follow the following steps:

    git clone git@github.com:JohnathanMarkSmith/SpringWithDojo.git
    cd SpringWithDojo/
    mvn tomcat7:run

Now open your web brower and goto http://127.0.0.1:8080/SpringWithDojo/

This its... Have fun with it...


If you have any questions or comments please email me at john@johnathanmarksmith.com or checkout my web site http://JohnathanMarkSmith.com
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
